name: Bit Barrage
description:
A space shoot 'em up made for EpicMegaJam 2021!

Play as a usb flash drive tearing down the information superhighway while avoiding unwanted files. Be careful not to rely on your specials too much or the CPU might just lock up! Can you make it 25 waves and defeat the boss before you run out of space?

Controls:

MoveWASD/ Gamepad Left ThumbstickFireLeft Mouse Button/ Gamepad Right TriggerShieldRight Mouse Button/ Gamepad Right ShoulderBlocks attacks at the cost of CPU Utilization (stamina)BoostSpacebar/ Gamepad Face Button DownIncrease movement speed at the cost of CPU UtilizationRollF / Gamepad Left TriggerAvoid Attacks at the cost of CPU UtilizationThrottleG / Gamepad Left Face ButtonSpecial attack that slows enemies and projectiles. Costs CPU Utilization

Sounds are from various GameDevMarket packs that were part of the Music & Sound FX 2 Bundle on Humble Bundle

Music is:

https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/cyberpunk-music-pack-7297/
